channel.title: Computer Vision on Julien Pascal
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Julien Pascal

item.title: A Primer on Computer Vision
item.description: For a specific project on the housing market (here), I had to analyze thousands of photos. To do that, I used a convolutional neural network (CNN), which is a fancy name for a complicated function that can be “trained” to recognize patterns in images. In this blog post, I would like to introduce the “Hello World” of computer vision and CNN: the classification of hand-written digits from the MNIST dataset.
